publ: by Living on the Edge with Chip Ingram, Inc.
name: LivingontheEdge
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: living on the edge
des:
This skill, from Chip Ingram and Living on the Edge, delivers Chip's weekday radio broadcasts to your Alexa-enabled device. It will help you live out the truth of God’s Word and equip you to grow in your personal relationship with Jesus. 

Chip Ingram is the President and Teaching Pastor of Living on the Edge. As a pastor, author, coach, and teacher for more than thirty years, Chip helps believers move from spiritual spectators to healthy, authentic disciples of Jesus, by living out God's truth in their daily lives and relationships. 

Living on the Edge is an international, teaching and discipleship ministry that exists to help Christians live like Christians. The ministry creates biblical teaching and tools to challenge and equip spiritually hungry Christians to become mature disciples of Jesus. 

Once enabled, you can listen to our most recent episode by saying, “Alexa, play Living on the Edge.”

To pause or resume any episode, say “Alexa, pause” or “Alexa, resume.” To listen to previous episodes, say “Alexa, play the previous episode.” If you want to know the title of an episode while playing the latest episode, say "Alexa, ask Living on the Edge for the title of this episode." If you want to know the date of an episode while playing the latest episode, say "Alexa, ask Living on the Edge for the date of this episode."

For more information about Living on the Edge with Chip Ingram, please visit https://LivingontheEdge.org.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
